channel.title: Anybody going to BaconBizConf this year?
channel.description:
Hey all,
About a week ago I received an e-mail from Amy Hoy advising that they're holding BaconBizConf on the 28th/29th May in Philadelphia. Anybody been before? Would love to hear how you got on with it as I'm seriously considering attending this year. It would be great to hear from people who have attended previous years.
Cheers
Simon
